Instruction: Preheat your oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease and flour a 10-inch Bundt pan.

Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda in a large bowl. Blend in buttermilk, butter, eggs, and vanilla using an electric mixer. Beat on medium speed for 3 minutes. Pour batter into the greased and floured Bundt pan.
Bake the cake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, approximately 60 minutes.

When the cake is nearly done, prepare the butter sauce by mixing sugar, butter, water, and vanilla in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir until smooth and well blended without bringing it to a boil.
Pour the butter sauce over the warm cake, allowing it to seep into the holes for a deliciously buttery flavor throughout.
Allow the cake to cool in the pan for about 30 minutes before removing.
